title: InboundStxTransfer
description: A inbound STX transfer with a memo

amount.description: Transfer amount in micro-STX as integer string

memo.description: Hex encoded memo bytes associated with the transfer

block_height.description: Block height at which this transfer occurred

tx_id.description: The transaction ID in which this transfer occurred

transfer_type.description: Indicates if the transfer is from a stx-transfer transaction or a contract-call transaction

tx_index.description: Index of the transaction within a block
